title: What Lives Here?
subtle: Descriptive (nonfiction), 40 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR110L
description: What Lives Here? provides an overview of several animals, including insects, amphibians, and mammals, and their homes. Photographs establish one-to-one correspondence and support readers who are learning to look at print.
meta: animals, bear, bee, child, deer, fish, frog, here, live, worm
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant sound /h/
Periods : Recognize and understand the use of a period at the end of a sentence
High-Frequency Words : Identify, write, and correctly use high-frequency word a

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
